question: One of your friends wants to apply for a job involving working with foreign teenagers. Write a letter of recommendation for him/her. In your letter you should say: how long you have known your friend something about your friend’s personality and explain why you think your friend would make a good employee
text: Hope you are doing well.I am writing this letter to introduce my friend Joseph to you  and I believe he can be a great asset to your company.

Joseph was my collegemate in my post-graduation studies.His gentle behaviour and brilliance made him the teacher's favourite.He possesses  wonderful communication skills and he was the magazine editor during that tenure.Furthermore,he possesses experience in dealing with foreign students since he did a part-time job In Growing Stars Academy,which is an online teaching centre.Additionally, his calm nature and patience make him a  perfect choice for the International Student Counsellor in your academy.Since I know him for the past 10 years,I humbly request you to  consider these factors and give him an opportunity to prove himself and I assure you that you will never get disappointed.
It will be well appreciated if you consider my request.I am looking forward to hearing a positive reply from your side.
